name: GestureMask
desc: Options that control how adding a gesture to a view affects other gestures recognized by the view and its subviews.

items.name: static let all: GestureMask
items.desc: Enable both the added gesture as well as all other gestures on the view and its subviews.

items.name: static let gesture: GestureMask
items.desc: Enable the added gesture but disable all gestures in the subview hierarchy.

items.name: static let subviews: GestureMask
items.desc: Enable all gestures in the subview hierarchy but disable the added gesture.

items.name: static let none: GestureMask
items.desc: Disable all gestures in the subview hierarchy, including the added gesture.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new option set from the given raw value.

items.name: let rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: typealias ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of the elements of an array literal.

items.name: typealias Element
items.desc: The element type of the option set.
